sentence: Two other contenders who can put their own money into the contest are state treasurer Sarah Godlewski, supported by women's groups, and Alex Lasry, whose family owns the Milwaukee Bucks professional basketball team.
author: Albert Hunt
title: Midterm primaries might be critical to balance of the Senate

sentence: ), has an early edge over Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry, state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski and Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson.
title: Senate primaries to watch
